items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap snaps, awkward fit
items.body: Not as cute as it appears on the model. Very lightweight cheap snaps that pop open easily. Also, something is off with the dimensions of the top part of the dress. One snap came all the way loose from the fabric my first time trying on dress. Read more
items.author: Kennedy

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save your money
items.body: Sizing smaller than should be. Almost took 2 months too arrive. Disappointed Read more
items.author: Lisa Marks

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not look like the picture.
items.author: L

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress for summer
items.body: 36-30-40 measurements, 5’7”, 145lbs and purchased this in a small. There is just enough stretch to this dress to keep it comfortable. The material is thick while also being breathable. I have worn this dress on a hot summer day and still been comfortable. I think it is flattering. The snaps unsnap on the skirt portion but not the top. I am able to wear this without a bra. If you are more than a 34D-36B it might be tight in the chest. My primary critique is that the bust line sewn in isn’t exactly in a natural place for most women unless you sit very high in the dress. This washes well. I think the fit is true to size and I would purchase this again. Read more
items.author: MrsSlim

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality
items.body: 5'6 107 lbs XS Perfect fit, nice quality, flattering. Read more
items.author: Silver K

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Feels uncomfortable in the chest area , breast cups higher than they should be
items.body: Cute dress, decent price, but the breast cups fit is way off. It's designed like for little girls, not women. The top area acts like you have no cleavage or you are a nun and it might look fine to others but you will feel immediately that where the dress shows your boobs is higher than your actual boobs. I'm not a big chested lady, nor do I try to accentuate my chest, so this was a weird thing for me to complain about, but I am because it's different than any other dress. It should end nicely at your bosom, but it comes up higher in a way that had me constantly pulling it down. I would not buy it again, nor would I trust this company to make good products. I don't know who they made this for. If you have boobs that sit higher on your chest than the average person, or if you are a really tall child with no boobs, perhaps it feels fine. The average person, it's gonna feel a bit off in the chest area. Not including a picture because you literally can't tell looking at it since I am smaller chested, if you had more cleavage it might look like you have two sets of boobs, or it might just feel uncomfortable. Read more
items.author: Korenski

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Dark Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
